channel.title: Networking on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Noetic Nought

item.title: Recurse Center, 2014-07-30
item.description: (Re) Learning C Stephanie and I worked through the Networking chapter of the book. We faced some issues with writing 0 bytes to memory, since most of the code was dealing with strings. I still haven’t figured out how to do this, correctly.
